description: This Lido v3 pre-deposit vault accepts ETH deposits that MEV Capital will curate and restake to Symbiotic until Lido v3's release. Kiln serves as the partner node operator for Symbiotic, helping restakers secure +13 networks.Upon Lido v3 release, the ETH will be staked withÂ Kiln.fi, combining Kiln's staking infrastructure excellence with MEV Capital's curation expertise.
name: MEV Capital Lidov3 stVault x Kiln
